title: O/L applications by post from today (13)
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The Department of Posts informed that the distribution of admission cards for the G.C.E Ordinary examination students commenced on Friday (13).
Further, the Department of Examinations noted that the G.C.E Ordinary Level Examination 2021 will be held from 23rd May – 1st June 2022.

Tuition Classes, Seminars, Lectures, and Workshops aimed at the G. C. E. O/L exam are prohibited from midnight on the 17th of May until the conclusion of the exams, said the Commissioner-General of Examinations.
‘6.9 Mn voted to defeat Ranil, his appointment is a total disregard to that mandate,’ – Anura Kumara
Senior DIG Deshabandu at Human Rights Commission on Friday (13); HRCSL to summon Prisoners Rights Activists
